import React from "react" import axios from 'axios' //path must be changed accordingly to the param query input import XMLData from './xml/mc.xml' class Question extends React.Component{ componentDidMount(){ axios.get(XMLData, {"Content-Type":"application/xml; charset=utf-8" }).then((response)=>{ const parser = new DOMParser() var xml = parser.parseFromString(response.data,"text/xml") question = xml.getElementsByTagName("") console.log( xml ) }) } render(){ return(

) } } export default Question
